sections.heading: Governor
sections.text:
to attempt amicable settlement of labor dispute on request of either party;

appointment of commission; arbitration.

sections.heading: Board
sections.text: of arbitration: Selection; majority may make valid award.

sections.heading: Written
sections.text: submission of controversy to board of arbitration: Contents and stipulations.

sections.heading: Award:
sections.text: Operation; judgment; exceptions; appeal to appellate court.

sections.heading: Agreement
sections.text:
of arbitration to be acknowledged; copies filed with county recorder and

Governor; duties of Secretary of State and Governor.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text:
acts during pendency of arbitration and within 3 months after award; liability

for damages.

sections.heading: Circulation
sections.text:
of notice of strike: Conditions and signatures; copy to be furnished Labor

Commissioner.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: for labor representative asking for or receiving bribe.

sections.heading: Picketing:
sections.text: Unlawful acts; acceptable acts; local variance; penalty.

sections.heading: Draft
sections.text:
of proposed changes to contract must be submitted in writing before members

vote on contract.

sections.heading: Election
sections.text:
to require local administration of plan providing health, welfare, pension or

other similar benefits to members of labor organizations.
